alert.note: Alert for Nantucket (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued October 20 at 3:37PM EDT until October 22 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM SATURDAY TO 2 PM EDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Nantucket County. * WHEN...From 5 PM Saturday to 2 PM EDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... Downed trees may lead to scattered power outages and minor damage to structures. The wind advisory may be expanded to include places like Cape Cod, Martha`s Vineyard, and the Worcester Hills where winds are currently forecast just below advisory criteria in further updates.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
